info.title: Infrashop Product Management API
info.description:
In this API documentation, you will find operations that you
  will call in order to manage your products. Operations here include retrieving
  products and SKUs by their IDs and creating/updating products and SKUs - including UDAs,
  categories, images and base information. Feel free to
browse through all of them and to try it for yourself!

tags.name: Authentication API
tags.description: Plain and simple authentication API. Just call it providing your username and password to retrieve your access token and your profile rights within Infracommerce marketplace API. Use this token in all other API calls in Authorization header.

tags.name: Product Management API
tags.description: In this group you will find API operations that you will call in order to manage your products. Operations here include retrieving products and SKUs by their IDs and creating/updating products and SKUs - including UDAs, categories, images and base information.

tags.name: Product Management API - UDAs
tags.description: In this group you will find API operations that you will call in order to manage your products and SKUs UDAs. Operations here include retrieving UDAs, setting values in batch (several in a single call) and managing UDA values individually.

tags.name: Product Management API - Images
tags.description: In this group you will find API operations that you will call in order to manage your SKUs images. Operations here include retrieving images, setting values in batch (several in a single call) and managing images individually.

tags.name: Product Management API - Stock
tags.description: In this group you will find API operations that you will call in order to manage the stocks. Operations here includes retrieving stocks and updating values in batch (several in a single call) or individually.

tags.name: Product Management API - Price
tags.description: In this group you will find API operations that you will call in order to manage the SKU's prices. Operations here includes retrieving prices and updating values in batch (several in a single call) or individually.

tags.name: Product Feed API
tags.description: In this group you will find batch API operations. Batch operations usually deal with a lot of data - like updating several products in a single call or retrieving all updated products since a predefined date. Usually these API operations are combined with Async Operations API in order to retrieve status of a batch operation.

tags.name: Async Operations API
tags.description: In this group you will find operations that you allow you to interact with Infrashop asynchronous operaions engine. This mechanism is used every time a long running operation is fired and you need to follow its execution

tags.name: Product Management API - Related
tags.description: In this group you will find API operations that you will call in order to manage your related SKUs their related types. Operations here include retrieving/creating/updating/removing related SKUs their related types by their IDs and others informations.

tags.name: Product Management API - Related Sheet
tags.description: In this group you will find API operations that you will call in order to manage your related SKUs their related types using a Sheet. Operations here include retrieving/creating/updating/removing related SKUs their related types.

tags.name: Product Master API
tags.description: In this group you will find API operations that you will call in order to manage your products using a Sheet. Operations here include retrieving/creating/updating the products.

post.summary: Create a new product into infrashop
post.description:
This API operation will allow you to create a new product into infrashop platform.

Required Functionalities

Produtos - Produtos - Gravar

parameters.name: product
parameters.description: Product info

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

400.description: Invalid product information provided. Please check response messages.

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: You cannot create this product. Please check response messages.

put.description:
This API operation will allow you to update a previously existing product & SKUs. Any non-mandatory value that you do not provide - such as category, UDA, SKU list or images - will remain unchanged. Product/SKU images can be a HTTP/HTTPS URL. In this case, Infrashop platform will download the image and resize it in order to send the product/SKU to the website. If you provide an UDA ID and UDA name, the UDA name will be updated (case sensitive). It has to be a previously existing UDA.

Required Functionalities

Produtos - Produtos - Gravar

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Product unique identifier.

parameters.name: product
parameters.description: Product info

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

200.description: The product was successfuly updated. An updated version of the product will be returned.

400.description: Invalid product information provided. Please check response messages.

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: You cannot update this product. Please check response messages.

get.summary: Retrieve the product by its ID
get.description:
This API operation will allow you to retrieve a product by its ID.

Required Functionalities

Produtos - Produtos - Consultar

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Product unique identifier

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: Sku unique identifier. If the SKU is specified, the returned product will contain only the SKU, the SKU is not informed, will be returned all product SKUs.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: You cannot retrieve this product. Please check response messages.

get.description:
Retrieve all product UDAs.

Required Functionalities

Produtos - Produtos - Consultar

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Product unique identifier

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: You cannot retrieve this UDA list. Please check response messages.

post.description:
Set product UDAs. Please notice that existing UDAs will remain untouched. If you provide a UDA that is already present in the product data, it will be updated. If you provide an UDA that does not have a value for this product, it will be added.

Required Functionalities

Produtos - Produtos - Gravar

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Product unique identifier

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

400.description: Invalid UDA information provided. Please check error messages for more info.

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: You cannot update this UDA list. Please check response messages.

parameters.name: productId

parameters.description: UDA unique identifier

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

400.description: Invalid UDA information provided. Please check error messages for more info.

403.description: You cannot update this UDA list. Please check response messages.

Required Functionalities

404.description: Product not found or UDA not found for this product.

post.summary: Create a new SKU into infrashop platform
post.description:
This API operation will allow you to create a new SKU into infrashop platform.

Required Functionalities.

Produtos - Produtos - Gravar

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

400.description: Invalid product information provided. Please check response messages.

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: You cannot create this SKU. Please check response messages.

put.description:
This API operation will allow you to update a previously existing SKU. Any non-mandatory value that you do not provide - such as category, UDA os images - will remain unchanged. This API won't change anything related to this SKU's product.

Required Functionalities. If you provide an UDA ID and UDA name, the UDA name will be updated (case sensitive). It has to be a previously existing UDA.

Produtos - Produtos - Gravar

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: SKU unique identifier

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

200.description: The SKU was successfuly updated. An updated version of the SKU will be returned.

400.description: Invalid product information provided. Please check response messages.

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: You cannot update this SKU. Please check response messages.

get.summary: Retrieve the SKU by its ID
get.description:
This API operation will allow you to retrieve a SKU by its ID.

Required Functionalities

parameters.name: skuId

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: You cannot retrieve this SKU. Please check response messages.

get.summary: Retrieve all SKUs related of a SKU
get.description:
This API operation allow you to retrieve all SKUs related of a SKU "father". This API will returned an array/list of SKUs related.

Required Functionalities

Produtos - Produtos - Consultar

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: SKU "father"unique identifier

parameters.name: skuRelated
parameters.description: SKU related unique identifier. If the SKU related is not related with the SKU "father" , the API will returned an empty array/list.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

200.description: The array/list of SKUs related of the SKU "father".

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: You cannot retrieve the array/list of SKUs related. Please check response messages.

post.summary: Create the relationships between one SKU to many SKUs
post.description:
This API operation allow you to create the relationships between one SKU to many SKUs based on the related types in the Infrashop platform.

Required Functionalities

Produtos - Produtos - Gravar

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: SKU "father" unique identifier

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The array/list with related type and the SKUs to create the relationships. Is not allow to send two items with same "relationTp"

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

201.description: The array/list of SKUs related of the SKU "father".

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: You cannot create the relationships between one SKU to many SKUs. Please check response messages.

404.description: SKU "father", SKU related or related type not found.

400.description: Two or more items in the array/list has the same related type

get.summary: Retrieve the SKUs related of a SKU and a related type
get.description:
This API operation allow you to retrieve all SKUs related of a SKU "father" and a related type. This API will returned one object with SKUs related and related type.

Required Functionalities

Produtos - Produtos - Consultar

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: SKU "father"unique identifier

parameters.name: relationTp
parameters.description: The related type such as crs (CrossSelling)

parameters.name: skuRelated
parameters.description: SKU related unique identifier. If the SKU related is not related with the SKU "father" , the API will returned HTTP STATUS 404.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

200.description: The SKUs related and related type of the SKU "father".

400.description: Invalid product information provided. Please check response messages.

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: You cannot retrieve the SKUs related. Please check response messages.

404.description: SKU "father", related type or SKU related not found.

put.summary: Update the relationships between one SKU to many SKUs of a related type
put.description:
This API operation allow you to update the relationships between one SKU to many SKUs based on the related types received.

Required Functionalities

Produtos - Produtos - Gravar

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: SKU "father" unique identifier

parameters.name: relationTp
parameters.description: The related type such as crs (CrossSelling)

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The array/list of SKUs to update the relationships.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

200.description: The array/list of SKUs related of the SKU "father".

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: You cannot update the relationships between one SKU to many SKUs of related type. Please check response messages.

404.description: SKU "father", SKU related, related type or relationship not found.

delete.summary: Delete the relationships between one SKU to many SKUs of a related type
delete.description:
This API operation allow you to delete the relationships between one SKU to many SKUs based on the related types received.

Required Functionalities

Produtos - Produtos - Gravar

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: SKU "father" unique identifier

parameters.name: relationTp
parameters.description: The related type such as crs (CrossSelling)

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

204.description: The relationships deleted for the related type and SKU "father"

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: You cannot update the relationships between one SKU to many SKUs of related type. Please check response messages.

404.description: SKU "father", SKU related, related type or relationship not found.

delete.summary: Delete the relationship between SKU and SKU related of a related type
delete.description:
This API operation allow you to delete the relationship between SKU and SKU related based on the related types received.

Required Functionalities

Produtos - Produtos - Gravar

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: SKU "father" unique identifier

parameters.name: relationTp
parameters.description: The related type such as crs (CrossSelling)

parameters.name: skuIdRelated
parameters.description: The SKU related unique identifier

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

204.description: The relationship deleted for the related type and SKU "father" and SKU related

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: You cannot update the relationships between one SKU to many SKUs of related type. Please check response messages.

404.description: SKU "father", SKU related, related type or relationship not found.

post.summary: Process the import of the SKUs and their SKUs related
post.description:
This API operation allow you to update, create and delete the SKUs and their SKUs related in an asynchronous process using a spreadsheet. To follow the status of the asynchronous process use the [Async Operations API].

Required Functionalities

Produtos - Produtos - Gravar

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

parameters.name: delete
parameters.description: This attribute indicates if the process will be used to delete the SKUs and their SKUs related.

parameters.name: sheet
parameters.description: The SKUs and their SKUs related spreadsheet XLS file to be imported. The SKUs related needs to be split using , (comma) or enter (Key Enter) or | (pipe) and needs to respect the header.

202.description: The infrashop will proccess the import of the SKUs and their SKUs related.

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: Your profile doesn't grant you access to this operation. Please login with an appropriate user.

post.summary: Process the exportation of all the SKUs and their SKUs related
post.description:
This API operation allow you to start an asynchronous process to retrieve all the SKUs and their SKUs related in a spreadsheet. To follow the status of the asynchronous process use the [Async Operations API].

Required Functionalities

Produtos - Produtos - Consultar

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

202.description: The infrashop will proccess the exportation of the SKUs and their SKUs related in a spreadsheet.

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: Your profile doesn't grant you access to this operation. Please login with an appropriate user.

get.description:
Retrieve SKU images.

Required Functionalities

Produtos - Produtos - Consultar

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: SKU unique identifier

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: You cannot retrieve this Image list. Please check response messages.

post.description:
Set SKU images. Please notice that all existing images will be replaced by the ones you are providing here.
SKU images can be a HTTP/HTTPS URL. In this case, Infrashop platform will download the image and resize it in order to send the product/SKU to the website.
Images will be added to the SKU (and to all other SKUs that share images with this one) in the same order you provided in the input, being the first image the main one. This API will return the HTTP status 202 because the Infrashop will proccess the resize of images in a batch proccess.

Required Functionalities

Produtos - Produtos - Gravar

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: SKU unique identifier

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

202.description: The Infrashop receive the list of images and will proccess the resize.

400.description: Invalid image information provided. Please check error messages for more info.

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: You cannot update this image list. Please check response messages.

parameters.name: Authorization

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: You cannot delete this Image list. Please check response messages.

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: You cannot delete this image. Please check response messages.

404.description: SKU not found or image not found.

post.summary: Update a collection of products in a single API call
post.description:
This API operation will allow you to update a collection of products
As this is a resource consumig operation, it will be fired on the background and you should use asynchronous API in order to retrieve its exectuion. After it is finished, you will be able to retrieve the execution result (which products were updated, which products failed, etc).

Required Functionalities

Produtos - Produtos - Gravar

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Products that will be updated in Infrashop platform.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

200.description: Async process information. Please use async API in order to follow its execution.

400.description: Invalid Product list provided. Please check error message for details.

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: You cannot update products using this API. Please check error messages.

get.description: This API operation will fetch the SKU stock's data by the "skuId", "warehouseId" and "stockTypeId" provided.

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: SKU unique identifier.

parameters.name: warehouseId
parameters.description: Warehouse unique identifier.

parameters.name: stockTypeId
parameters.description: Unique identifier  for Stock type. There are 3 different stock types. Reservation during checkout process tries to reserve stock from "real" stock (type 1) and then, if not availabe, tries to use virtual stock (type 2) and we have too the Cross-docking (type 3).

parameters.name: includeKits
parameters.description: Should the KIT's stocks in which the SKUs are included be returned too? Default is false.

parameters.name: saleChannel
parameters.description: Indicates the sale channel of the stock to apply the stock factor.

parameters.name: enableWarehouseId
parameters.description: It indicates whether the warehouse code is returned in response.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number. Starts with 0.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Page size. Cannot be higher than 20.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

200.description: A paginated list containing the SKU stock's data fetched. It will contain only one register if includeKits=false and at least one otherwise (if the SKU is not included in any KIT). If the SKU is contained in 5 KITs, for example, then the result will have 6 items: the SKU stock itself + the 5 KIT's stocks.

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: Your profile doesn't grant you access to this operation. Please login with an appropriate user.

post.description:
Updates stock information for a collection os SKUs.

Required Functionalities

Vendas - Estoque - Gravar
Vendas - Estoque - Estoque do tipo Fisico

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

204.description: The information was accepted by the marketplace and will be updated.

400.description: Invalid stock information provided. Please check response messages.

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: Your profile doesn't grant you access to this operation. Please login with an appropriate user.

get.summary: Fetches a list of SKU stock's data
get.description: This API operation will fetch a list of SKU stock's data paginated. In order to enhance the feching results, it's possible to provide the "skuId", the "warehouseId" and/or the "stockTypeId". If no parameters were provided, all SKU stock's data (paginated) will be fetched.

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: SKU unique identifier

parameters.name: warehouseId
parameters.description: Warehouse unique identifier

parameters.name: stockTypeId
parameters.description: Unique identifier  for Stock type. There are 3 different stock types. Reservation during checkout process tries to reserve stock from "real" stock (type 1) and then, if not availabe, tries to use virtual stock (type 2) and we have too the Cross-docking (type 3)

parameters.name: includeKits
parameters.description: Should the KIT's stocks in which the SKUs are included be returned too? Default is false.

parameters.name: enableWarehouseId
parameters.description: It indicates whether the warehouse code is returned in response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number. Starts with 0.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Page size. Cannot be higher than 20.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

200.description: The paginated list of SKU stock's data fetched.

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: Your profile doesn't grant you access to this operation. Please login with an appropriate user.

get.description:
This API operation will fetch the SKU price's data by the "skuId" and "priceTp" provided.

Required Functionalities

Vendas - Preco - Consultar
Sale Management Price Read for channel INT

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: SKU unique identifier

parameters.name: priceTp
parameters.description: Price type. This can be "DFL", which is the list price; "SLE", which is the sale price or "SLE-INT" where INT is a source name of sale channel, etc.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: Your profile doesn't grant you access to this operation. Please login with an appropriate user.

get.summary: Feches a list of SKU price's data
get.description:
This API operation will fetch a collection of SKU price's data paginated. In order to enhance the fetching results, it's possible to provide the "skuId" and/or "pricetp". If no parameters were provided, all SKU price's data (paginated) will be fetched.

Required Functionalities

Vendas - Preco - Consultar
Sale Management Price Read for channel INT

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Product unique identifier. This number has no decimal places.

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: SKU unique identifier

parameters.name: priceTp
parameters.description: Price type, like "DFL", "SLE" etc. This parameter is not allowed in combination with the parameter saleChannel.

parameters.name: saleChannel
parameters.description: Sale channel, like "NTS", "WAL", etc. When this parameter is informed then only two prices will be returned by the API: the list price and the promotional price for the sale channel. This parameter is not allowed in combination with the parameter priceTp.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number. Starts with 0.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Page size. Cannot be higher than 20.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

200.description: The paginated collection of SKU price's data fetched.

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: Your profile doesn't grant you access to this operation. Please login with an appropriate user.

post.description:
Updates price information for a collection os SKUs.

Vendas - Preco - Gravar
Sale Management Price Write for channel INT

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

204.description: The information was accepted by the marketplace and will be updated.

400.description: Invalid price information provided. Please check response messages.

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: You cannot update price for these SKUs. Please check response messages.

post.summary: Process the exportation of price by SKU's spreadsheet asynchronously

post.summary: Process the import of the products and SKUs from a spreadsheet

StockListPagination.description: Standard pagination envelope response. StockList entries will be available in "items".

links.description:
Collection of page links. You will find up to 5 links:
  • self - link to this same page
  • first - link to the first page
  • last - link to the last page
  • next - link to the next page. This will be only presented when there is a next page
  • previous - link to the previous page. This will be only presented when there is a previous page

PriceListPagination.description: Standard pagination envelope response. PriceList entries will be available in "items".

links.description:
Collection of page links. You will find up to 5 links:
  • self - link to this same page
  • first - link to the first page
  • last - link to the last page
  • next - link to the next page. This will be only presented when there is a next page
  • previous - link to the previous page. This will be only presented when there is a previous page
